title: Tillandsia viridiflora
text:
Tillandsia viridiflora is a <a href="species">species</a> in the <a href="genus">genus</a> "Tillandsia". This species is <a href="Native%20plant">native</a> to <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>, <a href="Guatemala">Guatemala</a>, <a href="Honduras">Honduras</a>, and <a href="Nicaragua">Nicaragua</a>.
Two varieties are recognized:
